Articles.Content:
Vertechs industries has created a large collection of useful parts for all your space travel needs

UPDATE:

Working on Mk3 fuselage extensions. Also learning C# so i can implement the plugin side of things.

It will probably be another few weeks before i can get a full release out.

Red Oil:

Red Oil is an extremely volatile liquid with its own oxidizer built in.

3 tanks: small, large, really large.

1 normal engine

Also included is a nuclear engine that uses heat from Red Rock to gain much higher efficiency

Stealth:

A bunch of plane parts colored black for stealth.

Miscellaneous:

Ambient generator: a really big and clumsy RTG unlocked earlier in the tech tree.

Decals: editable png file (not edible).

Jet aerospike: very powerful aerospike jet engine similar to the turbojet.

Small flat can of jet fuel: for whenever you need a small flat can of jet fuel.

Light nose cone: no air resistance or weight colored red.

Mk1 fuselage compressed: twice as much fuel with twice as much weight.

Mk1 fuselage LFO: a normal Mk1 fuselage filled with liquid fuel and oxidizer.

2m fuselage: really big fuselage.

2m flat fuselage: good for bases.

Radial drouge chute: a drouge parachute that you can put on the side.

Strong struts: extremely strong and heavy struts.

20 ton weight: Very heavy and very small, good for testing.

W.I.P.

Shadow Fuel: will eventually be a weightless fuel only obtainable by mining.

Test parts: no purpose.

TODO:

Textures and Models: Most of the parts still need to be modeled and textured. Stock parts are used as placeholders

Plugins: There will someday be a way to extract minerals from certain planets/moons.

Scientific Series: Add more experiments and science parts.

Mk3 Fuselage Extensions: Various useful Mk3 parts, cargo bay, crew cabin, etc.

Exploration Series: Will be a series of parts for massive ships to explore other star systems. Would like to write a plugin for teleporting/warping.

DOWNLOAD HERE

Beta Release 0.1

Looks fun, but specs, and how is it balenced.
I want to get down the framework before i start working on balancing or cosmetic stuff.

I want to get down the framework before i start working on balancing or cosmetic stuff.

I love the Red! Red is my favorite color! I could definetely use these to cover some of the gaps in parts for Interstellar.
I like how red oil tank looks, this flammable liquid sign.
